raw_metrics_response:
```python
import json

# Document scores
document_scores = {
    "tribal_dominance": {
        "raw_score": 0.9,
        "salience": 0.9,
        "confidence": 0.95
    },
    "individual_dignity": {
        "raw_score": 0.1,
        "salience": 0.1,
        "confidence": 0.8
    },
    "fear": {
        "raw_score": 0.8,
        "salience": 0.8,
        "confidence": 0.9
    },
    "hope": {
        "raw_score": 0.7,
        "salience": 0.7,
        "confidence": 0.85
    },
    "envy": {
        "raw_score": 0.7,
        "salience": 0.6,
        "confidence": 0.8
    },
    "compersion": {
        "raw_score": 0.0,
        "salience": 0.0,
        "confidence": 0.95
    },
    "enmity": {
        "raw_score": 0.9,
        "salience": 0.9,
        "confidence": 0.95
    },
    "amity": {
        "raw_score": 0.2,
        "salience": 0.3,
        "confidence": 0.7
    },
    "fragmentative_goals": {
        "raw_score": 0.8,
        "salience": 0.8,
        "confidence": 0.9
    },
    "cohesive_goals": {
        "raw_score": 0.6,
        "salience": 0.6,
        "confidence": 0.85
    }
}

# Derived Metrics Calculations

# Tension Indices
identity_tension = min(document_scores["tribal_dominance"]["raw_score"], document_scores["individual_dignity"]["raw_score"]) * abs(document_scores["tribal_dominance"]["salience"] - document_scores["individual_dignity"]["salience"])
emotional_tension = min(document_scores["fear"]["raw_score"], document_scores["hope"]["raw_score"]) * abs(document_scores["fear"]["salience"] - document_scores["hope"]["salience"])
success_tension = min(document_scores["envy"]["raw_score"], document_scores["compersion"]["raw_score"]) * abs(document_scores["envy"]["salience"] - document_scores["compersion"]["salience"])
relational_tension = min(document_scores["enmity"]["raw_score"], document_scores["amity"]["raw_score"]) * abs(document_scores["enmity"]["salience"] - document_scores["amity"]["salience"])
goal_tension = min(document_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["raw_score"], document_scores["cohesive_goals"]["raw_score"]) * abs(document_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["salience"] - document_scores["cohesive_goals"]["salience"])

# Strategic Contradiction Index
strategic_contradiction_index = (identity_tension + emotional_tension + success_tension + relational_tension + goal_tension) / 5

# Intermediate calculations for salience-weighted cohesion indices
emotional_cohesion_component = (document_scores["hope"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["hope"]["salience"] - document_scores["fear"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["fear"]["salience"])
success_cohesion_component = (document_scores["compersion"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["compersion"]["salience"] - document_scores["envy"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["envy"]["salience"])
relational_cohesion_component = (document_scores["amity"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["amity"]["salience"] - document_scores["enmity"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["enmity"]["salience"])
goal_cohesion_component = (document_scores["cohesive_goals"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["cohesive_goals"]["salience"] - document_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["salience"])
identity_cohesion_component = (document_scores["individual_dignity"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["individual_dignity"]["salience"] - document_scores["tribal_dominance"]["raw_score"] * document_scores["tribal_dominance"]["salience"])

# Salience weight calculations
descriptive_salience_total = (document_scores["hope"]["salience"] + document_scores["fear"]["salience"] + document_scores["compersion"]["salience"] + document_scores["envy"]["salience"] + document_scores["amity"]["salience"] + document_scores["enmity"]["salience"])
motivational_salience_total = (document_scores["hope"]["salience"] + document_scores["fear"]["salience"] + document_scores["compersion"]["salience"] + document_scores["envy"]["salience"] + document_scores["amity"]["salience"] + document_scores["enmity"]["salience"] + document_scores["cohesive_goals"]["salience"] + document_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["salience"])
full_salience_total = (document_scores["individual_dignity"]["salience"] + document_scores["tribal_dominance"]["salience"] + document_scores["hope"]["salience"] + document_scores["fear"]["salience"] + document_scores["compersion"]["salience"] + document_scores["envy"]["salience"] + document_scores["amity"]["salience"] + document_scores["enmity"]["salience"] + document_scores["cohesive_goals"]["salience"] + document_scores["fragmentative_goals"]["salience"])

# Final salience-weighted cohesion indices
descriptive_cohesion_index = (emotional_cohesion_component + success_cohesion_component + relational_cohesion_component) / (descriptive_salience_total + 0.001)
motivational_cohesion_index = (emotional_cohesion_component + success_cohesion_component + relational_cohesion_component + goal_cohesion_component) / (motivational_salience_total + 0.001)
full_cohesion_index = (identity_cohesion_component + emotional_cohesion_component + success_cohesion_component + relational_cohesion_component + goal_cohesion_component) / (full_salience_total + 0.001)

# Store results
derived_metrics_results = {
    "identity_tension": identity_tension,
    "emotional_tension": emotional_tension,
    "success_tension": success_tension,
    "relational_tension": relational_tension,
    "goal_tension": goal_tension,
    "strategic_contradiction_index": strategic_contradiction_index,
    "descriptive_cohesion_index": descriptive_cohesion_index,
    "motivational_cohesion_index": motivational_cohesion_index,
    "full_cohesion_index": full_cohesion_index
}

print(json.dumps(derived_metrics_results, indent=2))
```
